alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central DeSoto County through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Southeast Arcadia, or 7 miles south of Arcadia, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcadia, Southeast Arcadia, Nocatee and Fort Ogden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
